From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Ok, Part 1 was about features for a new scenario editor.  Well, I 
believe some people are working on that.  Part 2 was about existing 
characters.  This part will be about adding new characters.

More generators:  Specifically, a Faerie generator.

Definitely another class of Mages: Practical Mage.  When the mage 
reaches the point of choosing to become an Archmage, it can also 
choose to become a Practical Mage.  Yea, it has the basic attacks plus 
teleportation and ability to create a teleporter marker.  2nd attack, 
teleport teammates.  Alternate: Teleport opponents.  3rd attack, 
create teleporter,  This would require an existing teleport marker.  
Note: all teleporters created by a Practical Mage are linked.  
Aternate to teleporters:  Black hole.  Walking in it kills friends and 
foes alike.  Size and duration is determined by stats on Practical 
Mage.  Freeze time is 4th attack.  Just a carry over from Mage's 
attacks.  Alternate: Slow down time.  Watch as your teammates are able 
to move twice as fast as your opponents.  Magic is regenerated at 
normal time.
